00000110 11000000 01111111 00000000
00000110 00000000 01000000 00000000

01000001 10000000 11111111 11111111
01000001 01000000 00000000 00000000

// Big endian

00000000 01111111 11000000 00000110
00000000 01000000 00000000 00000110

11111111 11111111 10000000 01000001
00000000 00000000 01000000 01000001 

// Grouped in bits

// iABC C = -1
000000000 111111111 00000000 000110
000000000 100000000 00000000 000110

// iABx Bx = -2
111111111111111110  00000001 000001
000000000000000001  00000001 000001 

// OP and A is correct

// B, C are signed
// Bx is signed but sign bit is implicitly 1
